main event: Several unnumbered flying objects were sighted over Bismarck, North Dakota, with varying appearances and movements.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on August 25, 1954, with reports of 10-12 objects observed., The objects were orange and red in color and moved erratically in various directions., The objects were reported to be solid and made no sound., The reliability of the observer is considered good and he is associated with the sheriff's office., The sky was at 2200 ft with light rain at the time of observation.
sighted object: 10-12 orange and red unmanned flying objects
witness description: the observer is a member of the sheriff's office in North Dakota
